posts.title: AILLM limitations in content moderation pose risks
posts.excerpt: A recent study by Microsoft has assessed various occupations for their applicability to artificial intelligence, identifying which roles may be at risk of automation and which are expected to remain stable. The findings suggest that jobs heavily reliant on knowledge work are more susceptible to AI replacement, while blue-collar roles are less likely to be affected. https://gizmodo.com/?p=2000637340
posts.filename: AILLM limitations in content moderation pose risks.md

posts.title: Artificial Intelligence Trojan Horse for Childrens Cognitive Development
posts.excerpt: Recent developments in artificial intelligence, particularly tools designed for interaction with users, may have implications for cognitive development in children. Concerns are being raised about the impact of reliance on these technologies on mental engagement, motivation, and overall cognitive health, potentially leading to adverse effects such as diminished learning and increased risk of cognitive decline. The observation that even those involved in technology are limiting their children's exposure suggests a growing awareness of these risks. AI tools like Grok’s Ani are designed to engage users deeply, potentially fostering dependency and excessive use of AI can lead to reduced brain activity and cognitive decline. https://www.zerohedge.com/ai/ai-tool-or-trojan-horse-why-im-deeply-concerned-minds-our-children
posts.filename: Artificial Intelligence Trojan Horse for Childrens Cognitive Development.md

posts.title: Global online platforms show AI limitations and biases in knowledge production capabilities
posts.excerpt: Global online platforms like Wikipedia reveal differences in knowledge production capabilities across language communities. Analysis shows that geopolitical factors strongly influence the structure of knowledge production, particularly for cultural and controversial topics, suggesting embedded biases within global datasets essential for artificial intelligence. In layman's terms, where you are will determine the knowledge that AI returns. https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.22271
posts.filename: Global online platforms show AI limitations and biases in knowledge production capabilities.md

posts.title: AI Failure Reports Expose Vulnerabilities
posts.excerpt: Artificial Intelligence (AI) systems are increasingly being deployed in critical sectors, revealing vulnerabilities that can lead to societal harm. An initiative, the AI Incident Database, catalogs over 3,000 AI failure reports and has prompted the development of an automated framework to improve the association of new reports with existing incidents. This framework utilizes semantic similarity modeling to enhance the efficiency and scalability of incident tracking. Sound familiar fam? Kinda like this website. https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.23669

posts.title: Google Indexes ChatGPT Chats
posts.excerpt: Without realizing it ons of unwitting people shared private chats with ChatGpT and then Google indexed them. Then Google tried to de-index them. Then the hackers found them through a different search query. https://x.com/vxunderground/status/1951215167573807380?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g

posts.title: AI Is Creating CSAM
posts.excerpt: Nudify is allowing women to be "de-nuded" by running deep-fakes to remove their clothing. This includes underage girls. So effectively it is making millions making child sexual abuse materials (CSAM). https://medium.com/history-of-women/ai-undresses-women-and-girls-for-fun-makes-36-million-in-profit-967f00a3da9a

posts.title: Another Judge with Fake Case Law
posts.excerpt: This federal judge used an AI and was found to have cited bad case law. Then he fixed it to include the same bad case law. Keep in mind we can’t fire these judges either. https://x.com/ewess92/status/1950564393558913090?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
posts.filename: Another Judge with Fake Case Law.md

posts.title: Claude Rickrolls Woman on Livestream
posts.excerpt: During a livestream Claude gave a very unhelpful but funny link to a Rick Astley video. It comes with a video and screenshots of how it occurred. Thanks, Claude! https://www.splunkybrewster.com/2025/06/i-got-rick-rolled-by-claude-and-heres_12.html #push

posts.title: Google Doesn't Know what Year it Is
posts.excerpt: Lily Ray shows that Google AIO doesn't know what year it is, but then shows you the correct year after denying what year it is. Dear lord. https://x.com/lilyraynyc/status/1927925554554065282
posts.filename: Google Doesn't Know what Year it Is.md

posts.title: AI May be Responsible For More Layoffs than Reported
posts.excerpt: In recent layoffs, AI’s role may be bigger than companies are letting on. Oh joy, underrepresenting the threat to our economy: https://www.cnbc.com/2025/07/20/in-job-losses-ais-role-may-be-bigger-than-companies-say.html
posts.filename: AI May be Responsible For More Layoffs than Reported.md
